text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
Your work bringing out the individuality
of the Uma Musume is a marvel. To be
shown a different charm every time…

text_block_list.name: Otonashi Etsuko
text_block_list.text:
That's my promising trainer! Ahh, I'm so
blessed to be a reporter …
